DataElement.preferredName: Iobenguane I-131 Total Longevity Cumulative Dose Less Than Thousand Megabecquerel Per Kilogram Receive Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no indicator related to whether a total longevity cumulative dose of lobenguane I-131 less than 1000 megabecquerel per kilogram was received.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Iobenguane I-131 Total Longevity Cumulative Dose Less Than Thousand Megabecquerel Per Kilogram Receive
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An I 131 radioiodinated synthetic analogue of the neurotransmitter norepinephrine. Iobenguane localizes to adrenergic tissue and, in radioiodinated forms, may be used to image or eradicate tumor cells that take up and metabolize norepinephrine._Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition._The length or duration of life or viability._Increasing by successive addition._A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time._A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest is smaller than another object in quantity or measure or value or status._A natural number following 999 and preceding 1001 and the quantity that it denotes: ten times one hundred._A unit of radioactivity equal to 10E6 nuclear disintegrations or other nuclear transformations per second, or to 10E6 becquerels._For each, generally denoting a ratio._A basic SI unit of mass. It is defined as the mass of an international prototype in the form of a platinum-iridium cylinder kept at Sevres in France. A kilogram is equal to 1,000 grams and 2.204 622 6 pounds._To take, accept, or get something offered.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An I 131 radioiodinated synthetic analogue of the neurotransmitter norepinephrine. Meta-iodobenzylguanidine localizes to adrenergic tissue and, in radioiodinated forms, may be used to image or eradicate tumor cells that take up and metabolize norepinephrine.

Concepts.definition: An I 131 radioiodinated synthetic analogue of the neurotransmitter norepinephrine. Iobenguane localizes to adrenergic tissue and, in radioiodinated forms, may be used to image or eradicate tumor cells that take up and metabolize norepinephrine.

Property.preferredName: Total Longevity Cumulative Dose Less Than Thousand Megabecquerel Per Kilogram Receive
Property.preferredDefinition: Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition.:The length or duration of life or viability.:Increasing by successive addition.:A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.:A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest is smaller than another object in quantity or measure or value or status.:A natural number following 999 and preceding 1001 and the quantity that it denotes: ten times one hundred.:A unit of radioactivity equal to 10E6 nuclear disintegrations or other nuclear transformations per second, or to 10E6 becquerels.:For each, generally denoting a ratio.:A basic SI unit of mass. It is defined as the mass of an international prototype in the form of a platinum-iridium cylinder kept at Sevres in France. A kilogram is equal to 1,000 grams and 2.204 622 6 pounds.:To take, accept, or get something offered.

Concepts.definition: Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition.
The length or duration of life or viability.
A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.
A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest is smaller than another object in quantity or measure or value or status.
A natural number following 999 and preceding 1001 and the quantity that it denotes: ten times one hundred.
A unit of radioactivity equal to 10E6 nuclear disintegrations or other nuclear transformations per second, or to 10E6 becquerels.
For each, generally denoting a ratio.

A basic SI unit of mass. It is defined as the mass of an international prototype in the form of a platinum-iridium cylinder kept at Sevres in France. A kilogram is equal to 1,000 grams and 2.204 622 6 pounds.
To take, accept, or get something offered.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
